config.productivityenchantments.woodcutt: Change whether Woodcutting breaks all blocks within effective radius or only those connected.
This does not apply to log-type blocks
config.productivityenchantments.digging_: Change whether Digging breaks all blocks within effective radius or only those connected.
config.productivityenchantments.cultivat: Change whether Cultivation breaks all blocks within effective radius or only those connected.
config.productivityenchantments.plowing_: Change whether Cultivation turns all dirt blocks into farmland within effective radius or only those connected.
config.productivityenchantments.fertilit: Change whether Fertility plants seeds within connected farmland or all within effective radius.
config.productivityenchantments.planting: Determines whether hoe takes 1/2 per seed planted with Fertility.
config.productivityenchantments.growing_: Determines whether hoe takes 1/2 per bone meal when attempting to grow crops.
config.productivityenchantments.placing_: Determines whether placing torches deals 1/2 damage to the item. Default is False.
enchantment.productivityenchantments.woo: Cuts down entire trees. This enchantment also behaves like digging on all wood-type blocks.
enchantment.productivityenchantments.clu: Simply mines entire veins of the same ore type. Bigger veins have greater impact on durability.
enchantment.productivityenchantments.dig: Carves an area of blocks. The radius depends on the enchantment level.
enchantment.productivityenchantments.cul: Harvests fully grown crops in an area. The radius depends on the enchantment level. (final hoe upgrade i swear)
enchantment.productivityenchantments.plo: Plows an area into farmland. Max enchantment will also fully moisturize fields. The radius depends on the enchantment level.
enchantment.productivityenchantments.fer: Allows seeds to be planted or bone meal to be fed on crops over an area upon right click. The radius depends on the enchantment level.
enchantment.productivityenchantments.mag: Attracts any dropped items directly to you. Your best friend for mining over lava or killing flying blazes.
enchantment.productivityenchantments.tor: Places a torch down upon right click. Useful when mining.
